plugins.name: danger-prose
author: David Grandinetti
Orta Therox
plugins.description: A danger plugin for working with bodies of markdown prose.

plugins.name: danger-junit
author: Orta Therox
plugins.description: Get automatic inline test reporting for JUnit-conforming XML files

plugins.name: danger-xcov
author: Carlos Vidal
plugins.description: Danger plugin to validate the code coverage of the files changed

plugins.name: danger-rubocop
author: Ash Furrow
plugins.description: A Danger plugin for running Ruby files through Rubocop.

plugins.name: danger-the_coding_love
author: Valerio Mazzeo
plugins.description: Prints markdown containing a random post from thecodinglove.com.

plugins.name: danger-xcodebuild
author: Valerio Mazzeo
plugins.description: Exposes warnings, errors and test results. It requires a JSON generated using xcpretty-json-formatter to be passed as an argument for it to work.

plugins.name: danger-junit_results
author: Valerio Mazzeo
plugins.description: Exposes test results summary with detailed failures, given a path to a JUnit report file.

plugins.name: danger-simplecov_json
author: Marcelo Fabri
plugins.description: A Danger plugin to report code coverage generated by SimpleCov in JSON format.

plugins.name: danger-commit_lint
author: Jon Allured
plugins.description: A Danger Plugin that ensure commit messages are not too long, don't end in a period and have a line between subject and body
